title: Alesha Dixon displays post-baby body as she steps out in LA for America's Got Talent filming
text:
She gave birth to her second child just a few weeks ago.

And Alesha Dixon looked incredible as she stepped out in Los Angeles to take part in filming for America's Got Talent on Friday.

The singer, 41, put on a leggy display in a black mini dress with a tweed blazer over the top which showcased her toned post-baby body.

Stunning: Alesha Dixon looked incredible as she stepped out in Los Angeles to take part in filming for America's Got Talent on Friday

Alesha, who rose to fame in girl band Mis-Teeq, added height to her frame in a pair of barely-there perspex heels.

The star styled her brunette locks into a sleek sweptback low ponytail and she added a slick of make-up, which included a bold red lipstick.

Earlier this month, Alesha said she felt like the 'luckiest girl on the planet' as she shared the first photo of her seven-week-old daughter Anaya who she shares with husband Azuka Onenye.

Sensational: The singer, 41, put on a leggy display in a black mini dress with a tweed blazer over the top which showcased her toned post-baby body

In her confirmation message shared with her Instagram followers, she wrote: 'Anaya Safiya born 20.08.19. 7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet.'

The Hertfordshire native confirmed she was expecting her second child with Azuka in May, during an appearance on Britain’s Got Talent.

Taking to the stage during the first live show of the series, the media personality revealed her prominent baby bump in a form-fitting dress.

Stylish: Alesha, who rose to fame in girl band Mis-Teeq, added height to her frame in a pair of barely-there perspex heels

Her announcement was pre-empted by hosts Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly, who referenced to her pregnancy in a Morcambe and Wise style opening skit.

Alesha later enthused she was ecstatic to be expecting her second child with her husband. 'It's a lovely place to celebrate it,' she said, gesturing to the audience gathered inside London's Hammersmith Apollo.

The TV star had previously confessed she felt 'so much more relaxed' in her second pregnancy.

She gushed during an appearance on Loose Women: 'I feel great actually, I feel so much more relaxed this time around.

'It's great the first time around you read every single book going and the second time you're like, "I've got this."

'Azura is amazing, she's doing really well and kisses me every day and making sure everything's okay. She's so excited, beyond excited.'
